title: Art of Coloring: Muppets: 100 Images to Inspire Creativity
description: Part of the Art of Coloring series, which has sold over 2 million copies across the U.S.The Muppets are a lovable cast of characters who are colorful in every way -- in their looks as well as their personalities. These images of the Muppets are ideal for putting pen to paper and adding your own brand of color and style.Perfect for cultivating creativity, relaxation, and focus, these pages are filled with artwork that will help you bring the Muppets to life! Collect the entire Art of Coloring series!
author: Walt Disney Company
